H0.text: The Council of Trent in the 16th century was held between believers of what religious faith. Islam

H1.text: The Council of Trent in the 16th century was held between believers of what religious faith. Buddhism

H2.text: The Council of Trent in the 16th century was held between believers of what religious faith. Hinduism

H3.text: The Council of Trent in the 16th century was held between believers of what religious faith. Xty

A4.text: The Council of Trent was the 19th ecumenical council of the Roman Catholic Church.

A5.text: The Council of Trent was prompted by the Protestant Reformation and addressed Protestant heresies.
